about.title: Hello!
about.intro: I am Le Van Can – a Graphic Designer and Illustrator, passionate about creativity and storytelling through images. With a special love for cinema, especially the unique style of Nobuhiko Obayashi, I always strive to bring emotional and artistic frames into each of my works.
about.intro2: I believe that art is not just about creating beautiful images, but also about conveying emotions and stories. Every piece I create carries a part of my soul and experience.
about.philosophy_1: With 4 years of studying and working in Japan and an N2 Japanese background, I understand the aesthetics and design trends of this market. I always seek to combine creative thinking and artistic inspiration to create unique works.
about.philosophy_2: I believe every artwork must carry deep emotions and its own story. That's how I connect with viewers – through sincerity and visual storytelling.
about.philosophy_3: With the spirit of 'always striving for the best result', I am committed to delivering meticulously finished products in every aspect – from concept, composition to every design detail.
